trigger_prototype.expression: {Template NVIDIA GPU:nvidia.gpu[{#GPUID},throttle_applications_clocks_setting].iregexp(Not Active,#3)}=0 or {Template NVIDIA GPU:nvidia.gpu[{#GPUID},throttle_sw_thermal_slowdown].iregexp(Not Active,#3)}=0 or {Template NVIDIA GPU:nvidia.gpu[{#GPUID},throttle_sync_boost].iregexp(Not Active,#3)}=0 or {Template NVIDIA GPU:nvidia.gpu[{#GPUID},throttle_hw_slowdown].iregexp(Not Active,#3)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: GPU {#GPUID} throttling active
